articles.title: UN HRC to meet on Iran regime brutality against protesters
articles.summary: 'Nuremberg moment': UN Human Rights Council adopts motion for probe into Iran protest violence The motion's approval extends an independent probe into human rights abuses in Iran and calls for an urgent inquiry into the violent crackdown by authorities on protesters.
